definitions.definition: A grouping of smaller peoples or tribes as a nation.
The inhabitants of a region, especially the native inhabitants.
(plural: folks) One’s relatives, especially one’s parents.

definitions.example: Young folk, old folk, everybody come, / To our little Sunday School and have a lot of fun.

definitions.definition: The members of one's immediate family, especially one's parents
definitions.example: My folks visit us at Christmas.

definitions.definition: People in general; everybody or anybody.
definitions.example: Lots of folks like to travel during the holidays.

definitions.definition: (California) Late 19th and early 20th century migrants to California from Iowa and other parts of the Midwestern United States.
